title: Understanding AVPD
text: Avoidant Personality Disorder (AVPD) is a mental health condition. It is important to understand its key characteristics to identify it correctly.

title: Key Characteristics of AVPD
text: AVPD is characterized by a pattern of behavior that includes social inhibition, feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to criticism or rejection.

hintAnswer: a pervasive pattern of social inhibition, feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to criticism or rejection
title: Identifying the Correct Pattern
text: Which of the following patterns best describes AVPD?
choices: an inflated sense of $$self-importance$$, a constant need for admiration and attention, and a lack of empathy for others
a pervasive pattern of social inhibition, feelings of inadequacy, and hypersensitivity to criticism or rejection
a pervasive and excessive need to be taken care of by others
a pervasive pattern of preoccupation with orderliness, perfectionism, and control
